title: ExpirationTimeTypeEnum
description: The time of day at which the equity option expires, for example the official closing time of the exchange.

oneOf.title: AsSpecifiedInMasterConfirmation
oneOf.description: The time is determined as provided in the relevant Master Confirmation.

oneOf.title: Close
oneOf.description: The official closing time of the exchange on the valuation date.

oneOf.title: DerivativesClose
oneOf.description: The official closing time of the derivatives exchange on which a derivative contract is listed on that security underlyer.

oneOf.title: OSP
oneOf.description: The time at which the official settlement price is determined.

oneOf.title: Open
oneOf.description: The official opening time of the exchange on the valuation date.

oneOf.title: SpecificTime
oneOf.description: The time specified in the element equityExpirationTime or valuationTime (as appropriate)

oneOf.title: XETRA
oneOf.description: The time at which the official settlement price (following the auction by the exchange) is determined by the exchange.
